error.title: Error page!

http.401: You are not authenticated to access this page.
http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.
http.409: There was a conflict while processing your request.

error.cannotDeleteYourself: You cannot delete your own account!
error.fileUploadSavingError: Error! The upload failed. Make sure you are connected to the Internet!
error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
error.resultStringTooLong: Error! Result Text is too long (max. 255 characters)
error.submissionMissing: Error! The submission is not connected with the result anymore. Your changes were rejected.
error.resultAlreadyExists: A result already exists for this student in this exercise.
error.scoreAndSuccessfulNotMatching: Error! Only a result with a score of 100% can be successful.
error.feedbackDetailTextNull: Error! If feedback is present, it must contain feedback detail text.
error.quizAlreadyStarted: The quiz has already been started.
error.quizNotEndedYet: The quiz has not ended yet.
error.quizAlreadyOpenForPractice: The quiz is already open for practice.
error.groupNotFound: The group you entered was not found.
error.studentNotFound: That student could not be found in this course.
error.noLegalDocumentFile: The requested document was not found.
error.emptyLegalDocument: The privacy statement or the imprint must not be empty.
error.cantSaveFile: The uploaded file {{ fileName }} could not be saved.
error.emptyFile: The uploaded file {{ fileName }} is empty. Please check the file and try again.
error.externalSubmissionBeforeDueDate: External submissions are not supported before the exercise due date.
error.externalSubmissionForQuizExercise: External submissions are not supported for Quiz exercises.
error.noSubmissions: No existing user was specified, or no submission exists.
error.feedbackCreditsNull: Error! If feedback is present, all elements must contain points.
error.faqRewriteFailed: Could not rewrite FAQ. Please try again.
error.invalidGradeStepFormat: One or more grade steps are not following the correct format. Click on the "?" for more information.
error.examExerciseNotIncludedInScore: An exam exercise must be included in the score!
error.invalidGradeStepAdjacency: The grade steps don't map to a valid grading key. Click on the "?" for more information.
error.emptyGradeSteps: Grade steps can't be empty. Click on the "?" for more information.
error.textSubmissionTooLong: Text submissions can not be longer than 30,000 characters.
error.programmingExercisePolicyPresent: The submission policy could not be added to the programming exercise, because it already has a submission policy.
error.submissionPolicyHasId: The submission policy could not be added to the programming exercise, because it already has an id.
error.programmingExercisePolicyNotPresent: The submission policy could not be removed from the programming exercise, because it does not have a submission policy.
error.submissionPolicyAlreadyEnabled: The submission policy could not be enabled, because it is already active.
error.submissionPolicyAlreadyDisabled: The submission policy could not be disabled, because it is already inactive.
error.submissionPolicyToggleFailedPolicyNotExi: The submission policy could not be toggled, because the programming exercise does not have a submission policy.
error.submissionPolicyActiveNull: Submission policies must be activated or deactivated. Activation cannot be null.
error.submissionPolicyUpdateFailedPolicyNotExi: The submission policy could not be updated, because the programming exercise does not have a submission policy.
error.oneActivePlagiarismCheck: Please wait until the current plagiarism check in this course has finished until you start another one.
error.invalidActivationKey: The activation key is invalid. Please use the registration form to sign up.
error.size: Field {{ fieldName }} does not meet min/max size requirements!
error.idExists: A new {{ entityName }} cannot already have an ID
error.ambiguousContext: A new {{entityName}} must have an unambiguous context

template.build.plan.id: The Template Build Plan ID seems to be invalid. Please make sure it exists and is accessible for Artemis.
template.repository.url: The Template Repository URI seems to be invalid. Please make sure it exists and is accessible for Artemis.

solution.build.plan.id: The Solution Build Plan ID seems to be invalid. Please make sure it exists and is accessible for Artemis.
solution.repository.url: The Solution Repository URI seems to be invalid. Please make sure it exists and is accessible for Artemis.

student.repository.url: The Student Repository URI seems to be invalid. Please make sure it exists and is accessible for Artemis.

instructor.repository.type: {{repositoryType}} is not a valid instructor repository type. Only {{validTypes}} are allowed.

auxiliary.repository.id: The Auxiliary Repository ID seems to be set. Please make sure it does not exist, because it is set by Artemis.
auxiliary.repository.name: At least one Auxiliary Repository name is invalid or duplicated. Please make sure all names are appropriate and do not contain duplications.
auxiliary.repository.checkout.directory: At least one Auxiliary Repository checkout directory is invalid or duplicated. Please make sure all checkout directories are appropriate and do not contain duplications.
auxiliary.repository.description: The description of at least one Auxiliary Repository is longer than {{maxLength}} allowed characters!

invalid.testcases.weights: Before deactivating manual feedback, please give at least one test case a weight greater than zero.
invalid.page.request: The page request seems to be invalid. Please make sure that enough {{entityName}} entities exist, so that the request page can be created.

presentations.maxNumberOfPresentationsExceeded: {{name}} already gave the maximum number of {{presentationsNumber}} presentation/s.

error.noExerciseIdForQuestion: No exercise ID found for current question.
error.exerciseIdMismatch: The exercise IDs do not match.
error.solutionEntryError: An error occurred while retrieving the extracted tasks from the problem statement.
error.systemNotificationNeedsBothDates: Both notification date and expiration date must be set.
error.systemNotificationNeedsNotificationBefor: The expiration date must be after the notification date.
error.ltiNotSupported: LTI is not supported on this Artemis instance
error.titleAlreadyExists: A programming exercise with the same title already exists. Please choose a different title.
error.shortnameAlreadyExists: A programming exercise with the same short name already exists. Please choose a different short name.
error.courseTitleTooLong: The course title is too long (max. 255 characters). Please choose a shorter title.
error.courseIdUndefined: The course ID is undefined. Please make sure the course exists.
error.notAllowedInExam: This operation is not allowed in an exam.
error.profilePictureFilesizeTooBig: The file size of your image is too big, please upload a smaller one.
error.profilePictureFileFormatNotSupported: The file format is not supported, please make sure to upload a .png or .jpg file.
error.envVariablesTooLong: The environment variables are too long. Please make sure that each key or value does not exceed 1000 characters.
error.memoryLimitInvalid: The memory limit is invalid. Please make sure it is a positive integer and larger than 6MB.
error.cpuCountInvalid: The CPU count is invalid. Please make sure it is a positive integer.
error.memorySwapLimitInvalid: The memory swap limit is invalid. Please make sure it is larger or equal to 0.
error.dockerFlagsParsingError: Error while parsing the docker flags.

dueDateOver.noParticipationPossible: The exercise due date is already over, you can no longer participate in this exercise.
dueDateOver.participationInPracticeMode: The exercise due date is already over, a regular participation in the exercise is no longer possible. You can use the Practice Mode to solve the exercise.

teamExercise.cannotStart: Team exercise cannot be started without assigned team.

error.assignmentRepositoryNotAllowed: Assignment repositories are not supported for exam exercises. Please use the test run feature instead to try out the exercise.

room.fileTooLarge: The uploaded file exceeds the maximum file size of {{ maxSize }}
room.malformedJson: Couldn't parse {{ roomNumber }}, the JSON appears to be malformed
room.missingRoomNumber: Missing room number: please ensure none of your .json files have a blank name
room.parseIoException: An internal error has occurred while trying to parse the rooms
room.missingNameOrBuilding: Room {{ roomNumber }} doesn't specify a room name and/or building
room.missingSeats: Couldn't parse seats from room {{ roomNumber }}
room.malformedRow: Room {{ roomNumber }} has a missing or otherwise malformed row
room.malformedSeat: Room {{ roomNumber }} has a missing or otherwise malformed seat
room.invalidSeatCondition: Room {{ roomNumber }} has an unknown seat condition: '{{ seatCondition }}'
room.missingLayouts: Couldn't parse layouts from room {{ roomNumber }}
room.malformedLayout: Layout {{ layoutName }} is malformed in room {{ roomNumber }}
room.unknownLayoutType: Unknown layout type '{{ layoutType }}' in layout '{{ layoutName }}' in room {{ roomNumber }}
room.invalidLayout: The layout {{ layoutName }} in room {{ roomNumber }} is invalid
room.seatNotFoundFixedSelection: The seat at row index {{ rowIndex }} and seat index {{ seatIndex }} in room {{ roomNumber }} does not exist
room.missingDefaultLayout: The room {{ roomNumber }} does not have a default layout
room.missingSpecifiedLayout: The room {{ roomNumber }} does not have a {{ layoutName }} layout
room.duplicateRooms: The room {{ roomNumber }} was attempted to upload more than once
room.notFound: The specified room does not exist
room.alreadyInRoom: The student already sits in this room
room.noFreeSeats: There are no free seats available
room.noAutomaticSeat: Can't automatically determine seat of unpersisted room

service.multipleExams: All exam users must belong to the same exam, but currently they belong to {{ foundExams }} different exams

error.notEnoughExamSeats: The selected rooms can only seat {{ numberOfUsableSeats }} of the {{ numberOfExamUsers }} students
error.invalidRoomIDs: At least one of your selected rooms doesn't exist or is outdated
error.noStudentDistributed: None of the exam participants have been assigned a room and seat
error.reserveFactorOutOfRange: The reserve factor needs to be within the range from 0 to 1
error.wrongCourse: The reaction does not belong to the selected course.
error.reactionNotFound: The reaction could not be found.
error.missingAssociation: The reaction must be associated with a post or an answer post.

exampleSubmission.submissionIsNull: This example submission has no solution attached.
exampleSubmission.submissionIdMissing: The submission must be saved before it can be converted.

error.exerciseVersionIdMismatch: The requested exercise version does not belong to the provided exercise ID.
error.submissionExerciseMismatch: The submission does not belong to the specified exercise.
error.maxAthenaResultsReached: Maximum number of AI feedback requests reached.
error.submissionAlreadyHasAthenaResult: Submission already has an Athena result.
error.missingFeedbackSuggestionModule: Exercise does not have a feedback suggestion module configured.
error.examExerciseNoAccessToAthena: Exam exercises do not have access to Athena.
error.noAccessToAthenaModule: The exercise has no access to the selected Athena module.
error.athenaModuleChangeAfterDueDate: Athena module cannot be changed after the due date has passed.

passkeyAuth.notAuthenticatedWithPasskey: You are not authenticated with a passkey. Please authenticate using a passkey to access this resource.
passkeyAuth.notSuperAdminApproved: Your passkey is not approved by a super administrator. Double check in the user settings whether your passkey was super administrator approved and re-login in with the respective passkey.
passkeyAuth.loginRequiredButFeatureNotEnabled: Passkey login is required but the feature is not enabled on this Artemis instance. Please enable the passkey feature on this Artemis instance.
passkeyAuth.cannotRevokeInternalAdminPasskeyApproval: Cannot revoke approval for internal admin's passkey; if you want to revoke the approval delete the passkey instead.

CourseCompetency.wrongCourse: The competency does not belong to the exercise's course.
CourseCompetency.atlasDisabled: Competency links require Atlas to be enabled.

CompetencyExerciseLink.competencyMissing: The competency link must reference a competency.
CompetencyExerciseLink.courseMissing: The competency referenced by this link is not associated with a course.

Exercise.titleLengthInvalid: The title is not set or is too short.

FileUploadExercise.courseIdInvalid: The course can not be changed.
FileUploadExercise.courseOrExerciseGroupRequired: Either courseId or exerciseGroupId must be set, but not both.
FileUploadExercise.exerciseGroupIdMissing: The exerciseGroupId is required for exam exercises.

ModelingExercise.idMissing: The modeling exercise must be saved before it can be converted.
ModelingExercise.forbidChangeCourseId: Exercise course id does not match the stored course id

ProblemStatementGeneration.generatedProblemStatementTooLong: The generated problem statement is too long. Please try again with a different prompt.
ProblemStatementGeneration.chatClientNotConfigured: AI generation is currently unavailable. Please contact your administrator.
ProblemStatementGeneration.chatClientNotConfigured_detail: AI chat client is not configured.
ProblemStatementGeneration.problemStatementGenerationFailed: Failed to generate problem statement. Please try again later.
ProblemStatementGeneration.problemStatementGenerationNull: The AI returned an empty response. Please try again.
ProblemStatementGeneration.userPromptEmpty: The user prompt cannot be empty.
ProblemStatementGeneration.userPromptTooLong: The user prompt is too long. Please shorten your instructions and try again.

ProblemStatementRefinement.problemStatementEmpty: The problem statement cannot be empty.
ProblemStatementRefinement.userPromptEmpty: The user prompt cannot be empty.
ProblemStatementRefinement.userPromptTooLong: The user prompt is too long. Please shorten your instructions and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.chatClientNotConfigured: AI refinement is currently unavailable. Please contact your administrator.
ProblemStatementRefinement.chatClientNotConfigured_detail: AI chat client is not configured.
ProblemStatementRefinement.problemStatementTooLong: The problem statement is too long. Please reduce the content and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.problemStatementRefinementNull: The AI returned an empty response. Please try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.refinedProblemStatementTooLong: The refined problem statement is too long. Please adjust the refinement instructions and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.refinedProblemStatementUnchanged: The AI did not make any changes to the problem statement. Please adjust the refinement instructions and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.problemStatementRefinementFailed: Failed to refine the problem statement. Please try again later.
ProblemStatementRefinement.textExtractionFailed: Failed to extract the selected text for refinement. Please adjust your selection and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.invalidLineRange: The selected line range is out of bounds. Please adjust your selection and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.invalidColumnRange: The selected column range is invalid. Please adjust your selection and try again.
ProblemStatementRefinement.instructionEmpty: The refinement instruction cannot be empty.
ProblemStatementRefinement.instructionTooLong: The refinement instruction is too long. Please shorten it and try again.

ProblemStatementRewrite.chatClientNotConfigured: AI rewrite is currently unavailable. Please contact your administrator.
ProblemStatementRewrite.chatClientNotConfigured_detail: AI chat client is not configured.
ProblemStatementRewrite.problemStatementEmpty: The problem statement cannot be empty.
ProblemStatementRewrite.problemStatementRewriteFailed: Failed to rewrite problem statement. Please try again later.
ProblemStatementRewrite.problemStatementRewriteNull: The AI returned an empty response. Please try again.
ProblemStatementRewrite.rewrittenProblemStatementTooLong: The rewritten problem statement is too long. Please try again with a shorter input.

error.noCourse: An exam must belong to a course.
error.wrongCourseId: The course ID does not match the course connected to the exam.
error.examTimes: Invalid exam times: Please check that visible date is before start date, start date is before end date, and example solution publication date (if set) is after end date.
error.negativePoints: The maximum points for an exam must be greater than 0.
error.correctionRoundViolation: Invalid number of correction rounds: Test exams must have 0 correction rounds, real exams must have 1 or 2 correction rounds.
error.attendanceCheckViolation: Test exams cannot have attendance check enabled.
error.examWorkingTimeTooHigh: The working time is too long. The maximum is 43200 minutes (30 days). Please adjust the start and/or end of working time.
error.examGracePeriodTooHigh: The grace period is too long. Please enter a value between 0 and 3600 seconds.
error.examMaxPointsTooHigh: The maximum points value is too high. Please enter a value between 1 and 9999.
error.examNumberOfExercisesTooHigh: The number of exercises is too high. Please enter a value between 1 and 100.

userManagement.onlySuperAdminCanManageAdmins: You are not a super administrator and therefore not allowed to manage administrator accounts.
userManagement.cannotRemoveDefaultAdminRights: You cannot remove super admin rights from the default admin user.
